thread.title: Wizz signs another deal with CDB Leasing
thread.title_full: Wizz signs another deal with CDB Leasing

author: flightglobal.com
title: Wizz signs another deal with CDB Leasing
text:
Central European low-cost carrier Wizz Air has signed a further lease agreement with China's CDB Leasing – this time for six Airbus A321s that will begin delivering later this year.
China Development Bank's leasing arm and the airline did not release details of the transaction.
Wizz operates a fleet of 63 A320s – six of which were also financed by CDB Leasing and were delivered between 2014 and 2015.
The carrier will take delivery of its first A321 n November, followed by another unit in December. These aircraft are part of an existing order with Airbus.
Wizz also recently confirmed a new order for 110 new A321neos initially agreed during this year's Paris air show. If approved by shareholders, the units will begin delivering in 2019.
